Message.Title: Dividend payout only 22%
Message.Msg: XOM can afford to give us another big boost this April and it should. Money goes where it is treated best and conservative long term investors know that dividends make up a good part of their total return. We have to have a reason to stick with XOM and that has to be total return. They can well afford to give us a fifty percent dividend increase to put us on a par with other good companies. I would hate to bail out after so many decades but without a much bigger dividend I am tempted.

Topic.Title: America's declining scientific and technological and position...

Message.Msg: No, wahleee boy, the real reason is state governments in the US are subsidizing low income areas with the resources from high income areas, and the US Federal government does the same. That could easily be corrected by imposing state level tenant taxes on residents of low income communities to increase their tax contribution and bring it up to the average. With more taxes available schools could be improved and free university offered to all who can meet the standard. Then America could be more competitive. If the taxes reduce the disposable income of low income areas to the point where their birth rate drops so much the better...

Topic.Title: CPAC Looks Like One Of Those Frantic Middle East Protests

Message.Msg: The cowardly #$%$ in the Democratic Party have out done the chickenhawk neocons at CPAC with massive escalations in drone deaths, defense spending, and civilian slaughter. Obama was just awarded Israel's most prestigious honor for his destruction of Libya and Syria with Iran soon to follow. Executing American citizens without a trial is now more the liberal (or Stalinist) position to take according to the Manhattan media. CPAC will never be able to keep the borders of the USA as wide open as the Democrats no matter how hard they try. The GOP is in a desperate competition with the Dems to increase foreign aid.
